trans-unit.source: Monitors Web Parts connections for circular connections.
A Web Parts connection is a link or association between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (or other server or user) controls that enables them to share data.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão de Web Parts é um link ou associação entre dois <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (ou outro servidor ou usuário) controles que permite que eles compartilham dados.

trans-unit.source: In every Web Parts connection, one control acts as a provider of data and another as a consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Em cada conexão de Web Parts, um controle atua como um provedor de dados e outro como um consumidor de dados.

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control is both a provider and a consumer, and the provided data depends on the consumed data, there is the possibility of creating a connection that results in an infinite loop between Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle de Web Parts é um provedor e um consumidor, e os dados fornecidos dependem dos dados consumidos, há a possibilidade de criar uma conexão que resulta em um loop infinito entre os controles de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: These loops are called circular connections.
trans-unit.target: Esses loops são chamados de conexões circulares.

trans-unit.source: A developer can prevent a circular connection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker> class to track the number of connections for a provider connection point and a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Um desenvolvedor pode impedir que uma conexão circular usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker> classe para controlar o número de conexões para um ponto de conexão do provedor e um controle de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point and the control are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de conexão do provedor e o controle são especificadas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: If a circular connection is detected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker> object sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ConnectErrorMessage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on the provider Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se for detectada uma conexão circular, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker> conjuntos de objetos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ConnectErrorMessage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade no provedor de controle de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The control to track for circular connections.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTracker" /> class.
<paramref name="webPart" /> or <paramref name="providerConnectionPoint" /> is not provided.
<paramref name="providerConnectionPoint" /> is not a valid type.
Gets a value indicating whether a provider connection point is involved in more than one connection with a Web Parts control.
<see langword="true" /> if the provider connection point is used in more than one connection with the Web Parts control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o ponto de conexão do provedor é usado em mais de uma conexão com o controle de Web Parts; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
